mapper.insert: INSERT INTO studenOutside ( id, university_name, name, gender, major_no, age, phone, card_no, expire_date, teacher_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{universityName}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{majorNo}, #{age}, #{phone}, #{cardNo}, #{expireDate}, #{teacherId} )
mapper.select:
select id, university_name AS universityName, name, gender, major_no AS majorNo, age, phone, card_no AS cardNo, expire_date AS expireDate, teacher_id AS teacherId, create_time AS createTime, update_time AS updateTime from studenOutside
id like concat('%',#{id},'%')
name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
order by id desc
